content.rendered:
Merina Pradhan

Finance Lead

Merina has 6 years of experience providing Financial Management for large contracts, She oversees financial operations which include Cost Management, Payroll Administration and monitoring and keeping a pulse on the Financial Health of Company Operations. She is well-versed and highly experienced with both Firm Fixed and Cost Plus contract types. Merina holds a master’s degree in finance, an extremely friendly and easy to work with Finance Professional.

Contact Me
